channel.title: Authors on Deeksha D
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Deeksha D

item.description: Hi! I’m Deeksha. My favorite progamming language is R! I find statistics, math and algorithms beautiful, and inevitably Machine Learning is the field which intrests me the most. I like to keep myself occupied by reading, usually about data science, neuroscience or philosophy. Among other things, I like to draw, paint and cook.
